Competition/🇩🇪 ApicAI.description: Apic AI comes from research background - ⭐️ DeepBees – Building and Scaling Convolutional Neuronal Nets For Fast and Large-scale Visual Monitoring of Bee Hives. Company focuses on pollination analysis.

Competition/🇮🇱 Beewise.title: 🇮🇱 Beewise
Competition/🇮🇱 Beewise.description: Industrial level robotic beehives with image processing. Rent model

Competition/index.title: Commercial projects
Competition/index.description: This is a list of great apps, devices, code repos and products that we look at for inspiration

Datasets.title: Datasets
Datasets.description: Data collected by us is available via Google Drive, mostly due to the size of the data.

index.title: Research
index.description: We want to be aware of recent and historical development in research that is tied to bees, observability and machine learning. We are open to collaboration with research and academic institutions (see our docs for more engineering and ML specific articles).

Models.title: Models
Models.description: Some of the models that we trained
